attributes.action: Give more funding to the UK's armed forces and offer increased pay as well as giving serving members more perks. provide better quality field equipment and to stop the shrinking of our armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pay the armed forces higher wages, give serving members more perks such as tax exemption or lower tax if that member is on an active tour of duty and to provide them with higher quality equipment such as boots and cooking utensils. Another thing that i would like is more funding for the military and to stop the shrinking of all areas of the armed forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
